company_overview: Garvit Dani is a passionate Full Stack Developer and student, specializing in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). He builds scalable web applications, AI-powered tools, and secure systems.
unique_differentiators: Strong focus on security and data privacy
Innovative use of AI for practical solutions
Versatile skill set across frontend, backend, and AI
summary: Garvit Dani is a Full Stack Developer with expertise in the MERN stack. He has built diverse projects ranging from AI chatbots and educational platforms to secure password managers and interactive games. His work demonstrates a commitment to innovation, security, and user experience.
name: Garvit Dani
description: Garvit Dani is a dedicated Full Stack Developer and student. He specializes in building modern web applications using the MERN stack and integrating AI technologies. With a strong portfolio of projects like StudyAI, Taskly Pro, and Secure Stack, Garvit is focused on taking ideas to implementation.
